PRESENTATION.ABOUT: Hi there! I'm Romano, a web developer for over 5 years, graduated in systems analysis and development and postgraduate in full stack development, I'm currently a software engineer at Senior Systems, the 5th largest software company in Brazil. I really enjoy developing smart and modern solutions with an intuitive and interactive design. Feel free to contact me using one of the options below:

4ASSET_CRUD.TITLE: 4Asset Crud
4ASSET_CRUD.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful crud very well styled with Tailwind and built using Angular.
4ASSET_CRUD.LONG_DESCRIPTION: This Angular application provides a user-friendly interface for managing a list of users. It allows users to create new entries, view a list of existing users, edit their details, and delete them as needed. The project utilizes TailwindCSS for styling, ensuring a responsive and modern design.

TERMINATOR_SUPPLEMENTS.TITLE: Terminator Supplements
TERMINATOR_SUPPLEMENTS.DESCRIPTION: An Full-stack and Full-cycle e-commerce, built using Angular, Node.js with Express.js, MySQL and DevOps culture.
TERMINATOR_SUPPLEMENTS.LONG_DESCRIPTION: An e-commerce platform for supplements, built using Angular, Node.js with Express, and MySQL. This project have a full-stack and full-cycle content, with CI/CD implemented using GitHub Actions and the ECS service of AWS to auto deploy the application.

COSMETIC_PAGE.TITLE: Cosmetic Page
COSMETIC_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: A web application developed in react, that list and filter products.
COSMETIC_PAGE.LONG_DESCRIPTION: This is a web application that lists and details cosmetics. You can filter, sort, and mark cosmetics as favorites.

MOB7_DEV_CHALLENGE.TITLE: Mob7 Dev Challenge
MOB7_DEV_CHALLENGE.DESCRIPTION: This is a web application built using angular, that consumes a API and generate data in client side, about car localization.
MOB7_DEV_CHALLENGE.LONG_DESCRIPTION: This repository contains the source code for a Vehicle Point of Interest (POI) Tracking System. The application is designed to calculate and display the amount of time vehicles spend within predefined Points of Interest (POIs). It provides a web interface where users can filter the data by vehicle license plate and date, and view the processed results in a tabular format.

2018_2021.CONTENT: Started my college degree in Systems Analysis and Development, where I learned basic programming concepts, logic, flowcharts, data structures, and developed projects mainly in Java.

2019_2020.CONTENT: Internship at Simplifica, assisting in the development of responsive web applications, maintenance, and optimization of projects using React, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Sass.

2021.CONTENT: Full-Stack Developer role at NsInova, contributing to web application development using REST APIs and Angular as the main technology, assisting in back-end API development with Node.js and SQL, migrating old systems to Angular, and creating reusable components.

2021_2022.CONTENT: Frontend Developer at IsoEnterprise, helping the team in developing new modules to meet client needs, maintaining and optimizing the system using React.

2022_2023.CONTENT: Software Engineer at the Eldorado Research Institute. Main activities included developing clean and scalable web applications using Angular and Node.js, working with agile teams, CI/CD tools, planning and creating components, conducting unit tests, and mentoring inexperienced developers.

2023_2024.CONTENT: Started my postgraduate studies in full-stack development at PUCRS, filling many gaps in my knowledge, both conceptual and practical, learning the complete cycle of product creation and delivery, aspects of DevOps, UX/UI, and more.

2024_PRESENT.CONTENT: Currently working as a Full-Stack Software Developer at Senior Systems. My role involves developing sophisticated and modern systems for the construction industry, primarily using Angular and Node.js. As part of agile teams, I focus on delivering high-quality, scalable solutions that meet the evolving needs of the construction sector.
